functionalRequirement: A Data Publishing User shall have a view of all their published datasets.

identifiedNFRs.requirement: The system shall provide a complete and accurate view of all published datasets to authorized users.
identifiedNFRs.justification: The requirement ensures the system provides a complete and accurate view of published datasets for users.

identifiedNFRs.requirement: The user interface shall be intuitive and allow efficient filtering and navigation of published datasets.
identifiedNFRs.justification: A user-friendly interface is needed to navigate and filter published datasets.

identifiedNFRs.requirement: The system architecture should be modular and easily extensible to accommodate future dataset additions and modifications.
identifiedNFRs.justification: The system needs to be easily maintained to accommodate future changes and additions to published datasets.

functionalRequirement: The system shall offer functionalities for users to mark debts as settled (e.g., by cash payment) and update balances accordingly.

identifiedNFRs.requirement: The system must accurately reflect and update balances after a debt is marked as settled.
identifiedNFRs.justification: The requirement directly relates to the core functionality of the system, ensuring debts can be marked as settled and balances updated.

identifiedNFRs.requirement: The system should update balances in real-time or within an acceptable timeframe after a debt is marked as settled.
identifiedNFRs.justification: The system needs to process settling debts and balance updates quickly to avoid delays and user frustration.

identifiedNFRs.requirement: The system must implement secure mechanisms to prevent fraudulent transactions and unauthorized access to balance data.
identifiedNFRs.justification: Marking debts as settled and updating balances involves financial transactions, requiring robust security measures to prevent unauthorized access or manipulation.

identifiedNFRs.requirement: The system's user interface should provide clear instructions and guidance for marking debts as settled.
identifiedNFRs.justification: Users need a simple and intuitive interface to mark debts as settled, which should be easy to understand and use.

functionalRequirement: System must show any task that is completed in the task list.

identifiedNFRs.requirement: User interface should present completed tasks clearly and concisely.
identifiedNFRs.justification: The requirement focuses on the user's ability to see completed tasks.

identifiedNFRs.requirement: System should have a modular structure to allow for easy addition of completed task display features.
identifiedNFRs.justification: The system needs to be modified to add display functionality for completed tasks.

functionalRequirement: Administrative staff in the ward shall be able to update the beds-available list with recently vacated beds.

identifiedNFRs.requirement: The system shall accurately reflect updates to the bed availability list upon bed vacancy.
identifiedNFRs.justification: Ensuring the system allows administrative staff to accurately and completely update the bed availability list is fundamental to the FR.

identifiedNFRs.requirement: The system's UI for updating bed availability shall be intuitive and straightforward.
identifiedNFRs.justification: Ease of use for administrative staff is crucial for efficient data updates.

identifiedNFRs.requirement: The system shall update the bed availability list within 5 seconds of a bed being vacated.
identifiedNFRs.justification: The system needs to update the list promptly to avoid delays in bed allocation.

identifiedNFRs.requirement: The system's code for updating the bed availability list shall be modular and easily understandable.
identifiedNFRs.justification: Future modifications and maintenance of the system may require updates to the bed availability list function.

functionalRequirement: The system shall offer a wide range of functions for calculations, data analysis, and manipulation (e.g., SUM, AVERAGE, VLOOKUP).

identifiedNFRs.requirement: The system's functionality must be comprehensive and accurate for calculation, analysis and manipulation.
identifiedNFRs.justification: The requirement explicitly describes the desired functionality (calculations, data analysis, manipulation).

identifiedNFRs.requirement: The system must provide efficient calculation and analysis capabilities for reasonable response time and resource utilization.
identifiedNFRs.justification: Calculations and data analysis require appropriate performance.  The system must handle a large dataset.

identifiedNFRs.requirement: The system must provide clear, intuitive ways for users to utilize calculation, analysis, and manipulation tools.  Error handling is important.
identifiedNFRs.justification: The system needs to be usable by end users.  This includes clearly defined steps for data input and expected output.

identifiedNFRs.requirement: The system's design must allow for easy modification, maintenance, and testing of new calculation functions.
identifiedNFRs.justification: The system will likely need modification as new calculation functions are added or improved.
